title.narrative: (GEMS 4) Growth Employment in Sates Programme - Short term consultancies; Grant disbursement

description.narrative: This activity ( (GEMS 4) Growth Employment in Sates Programme - Short term consultancies; Grant disbursement) is a component of Growth and Employment in States Programme (GEMS)- reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £16,279,846. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Business Policy and Administration. , with the following implementing partners: Baker Tilly Nigeria, Coffey International Development, IMC Worldwide. The start date is 10-09-2008 and the end date is 31-12-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: General Economic, Commercial and Labour Affairs - Economic Affairs - General Economic, Commercial and Labour Affairs - investment promotion
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2017 Quarter 2
